text: Epic game. If there was a way you could play against other players online - WITH NO LAG - through an emulator mod and if I could find an SNES USB controller, I'd challenge everyone on the internet who has ever claimed to be good at Tetris Attack. I'm pretty fucking good, except I'm not sure if I'm the BEST since the only people I know who like this game are my dad (who's okay) and a friend who doesn't even wanna play against me anymore. xD
